Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Evidence \Ev"i*dence\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Evidenced}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Evidencing}.] To render evident or clear; to prove; to evince; as, to evidence a fact, or the guilt of an offender. --Milton. [1913 Webster]
evidenced adj : supported by evidence; "their evidenced friendliness to the US"
